Title: City of God
Overview: In the slums of Rio, two kids' paths diverge as one struggles to become a photographer and the other a kingpin.
Tagline: If you run, the beast catches you; if you stay, the beast eats you.
Keywords: male nudity, street gang, brazilian, photographer, 1970s, puberty, ghetto, gang war, coming of age, woman director, 1980s
production_companies: O2 Filmes, VideoFilmes, Wild Bunch, Globo filmes, Lumiere, Hank Levine Film, Lereby Productions
Cast: Alexandre Rodrigues, Leandro Firmino, Phellipe Haagensen
